The remaining assets that can be withdrawn today

depositETH(address).notice: Deposits native ETH into the Puffer Vault

depositStETH(uint256,address).notice: Deposits stETH into the Puffer Vault

getExitFeeBasisPoints().notice: Returns the current exit fee basis points

getRemainingAssetsDailyWithdrawalLimit().notice: Returns the remaining assets that can be withdrawn today
